name: Restaurant Extravaganzza
description:
Restaurant Extravaganzza is a simulation and management video game in which we will have to manage the premises inherited from our grandfather, a restaurant with home delivery.

Fulfill online orders quickly to satisfy your customers and improve the establishment as you progress.

Developed with Unreal Engine 4 with the possibility of migrating to Unreal 5.


Created by DOJAP Productions:

Website: https://dojap.itch.io/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DojapGames

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBh7nsBQcsDuWzNxQNxTpQQ
